products.title: Bella Blackout Mid Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This mid-grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.

products.title: Bella Blackout Rock Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The bella blackout rock roller blind in a lovely grey colour will suit almost any room.
